copy.headline: Websocket API v2

ctas.placement: Near headline (for FIX Interface access contact)

microcopy.text: WebSocket is a protocol providing full-duplex communications channels over a single TCP connection.
Bitstamp by Robinhood uses its implementation of websocket server for real time data streaming. Server is accessible on the following address: wss://ws.bitstamp.net
microcopy.purpose: Provide critical connection endpoint and use case

microcopy.text: Once you open a connection via websocket handshake (using HTTP upgrade header), you can subscribe to desired channels.
After this is accomplished, you will start to receive a stream of live events for every channel you subscribed to.

dataFormatting: Standard abbreviations: TCP, HTTP, RFC, W3C, IETF
trustSignals: References to IETF RFC 6455 (2011) and W3C standardization
Specific server endpoint (wss://ws.bitstamp.net) shows transparent infrastructure
Named company (Bitstamp by Robinhood) establishes ownership and credibility

copy.headline: Key information documents (KID)

microcopy.text: Key Information Documents (»KID«) available on this page are prepared in line with the Regulation (EU) No 1286/2014 on key information documents for packaged retail and insurance-based investment products (PRIIPs).
microcopy.purpose: Establishes regulatory compliance and document purpose

microcopy.text: The purpose of the KID is to provide retail investors with clear, factual, and standardized information about the nature and risks of the offered products.
microcopy.purpose: Explains investor benefit and intended use

microcopy.text: Before making any investment decisions, please review the applicable KID and our General Terms and Conditions.
microcopy.purpose: Directs users to review documents before proceeding

microcopy.text: This site was last updated on November 3, 2025 and will be reviewed from time to time.
microcopy.purpose: Establishes currency and maintenance of information

trustSignals: Reference to comprehensive risk disclosure in General Terms

copy.headline: Who we are
copy.subheadline: Shaping the new world of finance for the benefit of all.

microcopy.text: Security, transparency and regulation are the pillars on which we have made crypto securely accessible, and on which we now serve customers globally.
Our dedication to the secure evolution of the financial system is reflected by our AA rating as the world's top-rated crypto exchange in CryptoCom­pare's Exchange Benchmark report.

Our global presence has allowed us to become one of the most regulated crypto exchanges in the world. We have offices in Luxembourg, Singapore, Slovenia, the UK and the USA and take pride in our live customer support.
microcopy.purpose: Demonstrates global scale and regulatory compliance

trustSignals: AA rating from CryptoCom­pare Exchange Benchmark
Multiple global office locations (Luxembourg, Singapore, Slovenia, UK, USA)
Claim of being 'one of the most regulated crypto exchanges in the world'

copy.headline: Guidelines for Law Enforcement Agencies
copy.subheadline: At Bitstamp by Robinhood, we work closely with Law Enforcement Agencies to provide the information they need, while following the legal rules that apply in each country where we operate. Below, please find clear instructions on how to contact us, submit requests, and understand our compliance process.

microcopy.text: For law enforcement-related requests, please send all communications to our dedicated email:
microcopy.purpose: Direct agencies to proper contact channel

microcopy.text: When submitting a request, please ensure it's in an official format, either as a .doc or .pdf file. It's important that the document allows for copy-paste functionality, as we are unable to process scanned documents.

copy.headline: Risk Warning

microcopy.text: Dealing in Digital Assets involves a high degree of risk, and, therefore, should be undertaken only if you are capable of evaluating the risks involved and able to bear the risks of a complete loss of all capital
Investment in Digital Assets is unregulated, may not be suitable for retail investors and the entire amount invested may be lost
microcopy.purpose: Address regulatory gaps and suitability concerns

microcopy.text: The prices of Digital Assets are extremely volatile
Such volatility in the prices of Digital Assets may result in significant or total loss over a short period of time

trustSignals: Comprehensive risk disclosure across multiple factors
Clear communication that losses are possible and likely in some scenarios
